group_1.narration: ”You’re planning on using our club room for@the Moon-Viewing celebration tonight too, right?@Then this works out perfectly.”
”Plus, I think that it’ll be a good@opportunity for Liliana's students@to learn about the tradition of Mizuna.”

group_1.textCenter: Hmm...Yeah!
I got a quick OK from the head of the Tea@Ceremony Club.
If we go to the Tea Ceremony club room in@the old school building
we will be able to perform the tea ceremony!

[chara:301701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Job complete! [chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:301701:cheek_0][chara:301701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json:motion_300:eyeClose_1][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]Phew...
(I bumped into the head of the Tea Ceremony Club@before even arriving at the old school building...)
(And she agreed to do it with barely any@discussion at all! Who would have thought?)
(I’m so lucky, it feels unnatural...)
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ah!
I forgot to tell her where to meet...
(I’d better hurry to the old school building...)
...Tea Ceremony Head?

group_1.textRight: Sorry, I forgot to ask where we’re meeting.

group_1.textCenter: (...In the end, I finished my work without going@into the old school building.)
(I'm happy that the problem has been resolved,@but...)
(Is this really just a coincidence?)

group_1.narration: 【Exchange Meeting Schedule】@―Arrive (St. Liliana Academy Student Council)―@―Tea Party in the Student@Council room (New School Building)―

【Exchange Meeting Schedule】@―Tea Ceremony Demonstration in the Tea Ceremony@Club Room (Old School Building)― [textRed: New!]@―Moon-Viewing Celebration in the Tea Ceremony@Club Room (Old School Building)―

group_1.textCenter: (...Well, that solves the issue with the exchange@meeting.)
(After the Tea Ceremony Demonstration, we will@hold the Moon-Viewing celebration...)
(Since this also cuts down on our travel time,@it might even be better than before!)
Ah...
(If the exchange party is about to start, will I@make it back in time?)
My bag... I’m sure it’s still in the classroom.
I should bring it to the Student Council@Room while there's still time.
My bag... [chara:301701:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301701:cheek_0][chara:301701:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301701:lipSynch_1]Here it is.
It seems strangely full...
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh!?
Why is there a White Feather robe in here?
(How strange... During my time in the Wings@of the Magius,)
(I was definitely a Black Feather. A 100% bona@fied underling!)
(Then why is there a White Feather robe...)
(...There's a note attached.)
(No matter how you look at it, this is my@handwriting...)
(But I don’t remember writing it.)
(Deliver to Miss Akatsuki? Why did I want to@give it to her?)
(What on Earth is going on?)
(No way... Is this some kind of prank or@advanced bullying?)

group_1.narration: What on Earth did I get involved in?

group_1.textCenter: (Could this incident perhaps be related...)
(To the string of problems around the@exchange meeting’s prep...?)
(...It's not outside the realm of possibility.)
(No, I have to do my best even if it’s totally@unrelated.)
(The exchange meeting with Lilianna is a@traditional school event...)
(If I don’t handle it properly,)
(it’ll cause huge problems for everyone at school!)
[chara:301701:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Shoot, it’s time already?
I have to greet the Liliana students!
